document.full_text: lauri korpikoski scored twice and netted the go-ahead goal to help the phoenix coyotes secure a 5-2 victory over the anaheim ducks on sunday for some breathing room in a tight race for the playoffs.
document.title: coyotes silence ducks and strengthen playoff bid
lines_and_colors: lauri korpikoski scored twice and netted the go-ahead goal to help the phoenix coyotes secure a 5-2 victory over the anaheim ducks on sunday for some breathing room in a tight race for the playoffs.
